name: Organizing and Advocacy
description: CCDC advocates for tenant rights, affordable housing, and just planning and land use. In solidarity with other community groups across San Francisco, they mobilize communities for social and economic justice. Community Organizing - Provide leadership development within the community through education and opportunities to engage in the decision-making process around key community issues. - Provide assistance to other organizations to ensure the sustainability and continuity of grassroots organiza
